item.title: ssh to virtualbox guest OS
item.author: Author
item.description: sudo apt-get install ssh make sure ssh service is working netstat -tlp you should see following line: 1 tcp 0 0 *:ssh *:* LISTEN change virtualbox network setting to: Bridged Adapter with vnic0 ifconfig make sure host OS vnic0 address is in the same net with guest OS p2p1
